text: @EddieZipperer @AOC I would expect that in areas that have active cases of Coronavirus, people are choosing not to go out to eat to limit exposure. This is not just Chinese and Asian restaurants but for ALL restaurants. Always trying to create drama and discourse. She's the racist here.
